reviews.review: Meilleur jeu de tout les temp :D
Vraiment bien pour le prix qu'il coûte, une multitude de modes de jeu, assez cool avec des potes, recommandé!

Unless you're getting it for the source engine for Gmod, don't get this. Horrible game for new players, like all the CS games. I've legitimately had more fun doing poorly on CoD or BF than having a decent match on CS.

This game is one of classic i ever seen  who cares about the graphics, the gameplay is wonderful the guns are nice and the sounds and the communtiy is still alive till this day so i reccomend this game to anybody.

awesome game with so many different ways to play theres everything from zombie servers to surf servers and everything in between
Fun, you need this game to run GMod (the textures) but once you play Global Offensive you'll never go back.

I really don't recommend Source as GO and 1.6 are superb. I don't see much reason to play/buy Source as you'll be getting more of a package in GO or better controls and feel in 1.6. Other than if you need textures for GMOD.

Recommend this game i love it but not as much as CS:GO but still its a good game.

面白すギルゲーム。ロボットが使える武器をナイフだけにするとかなり鬼畜なゲームへと早変わり。

あくまでも自分の意見だが、リアリティを求めず面白さを求めるなら、買ったほうがお得！

Amazing game. As many think it's exactly like Call of Duty, it's not...or at least not entirely. The only time you can reheal is if you pick up a health pack instead of miraculously having Deadpool's healing factor. What's also great is that you can use this game in Garry's Mod and play maps you couldn't get without this game. Worth every penny!

You can change your playermodel to a banana in some servers
10/10

Recomendo. Assim como todo jogo da série Counter Strike, tem um gameplay icônico e envolvente, que te fornece horas de diversão... Foi ótimo relembrar os tempos de lan-houses lotadas com o CS 1.6

This is a great game!! I love it, its got tons of gamemodes you can choose from like surf, de dust, jailbreak, deathrun, etc. You can meet tons of friends on it ( like i met 3 friends on it yesterday ). Overall this game is amazing! Thank you steam for making it. I would rate the game 9.5/10. :D

Absolutely amazing game. I've spent so many hours just having fun with random people in Jailbreak, or Deathrun, or Minigames. It's also great for scrim games, and skill in this game typically transfers over to other shooters with relative ease.
